GeneralExplanationGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: 990-PF PART 1, LINES 13, 14 & 15 AND PART II LINE 20
GeneralExplanationGrp.MediumExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION'S BOARD OF DIRECTORS IS COMPRISED OF SENIOR MANAGING DIRECTORS OR EMPLOYEES OF BLACKSTONE INC. BLACKSTONE INC. PROVIDES THE FOUNDATION WITH THE USE OF ITS FACILITIES FOR OFFICE SPACE AS WELL AS THE USE OF ITS STAFF FOR ADMINISTRATIVE PURPOSES AT NO CHARGE. ADDITIONALLY, BLACKSTONE ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES PARTNERSHIP LLC ("SERVICES") (A WHOLLY OWNED ENTITY OF BLACKSTONE INC.) PROVIDED THE FOUNDATION WITH AN INTEREST FREE LOAN FOR OPERATING CAPITAL. THE LOAN WAS PARITALLY FORGIVEN IN FISCAL YEAR 2021 AND IN 2022, SERVICES FORGAVE THE REMAINDER OF THE LOAN BALANCE.
